text: I am not able to create new thread pools, the idea is to create new thread pool and allocate specific thread pool to each Servlet I have created.
creator: vincent.arokiaraj@bt.com

text:
Its becoming critical for us now, if Tomcat does not support then we need to look for alternate product as performance is the main issues. Resources need to be allocated for just that service.

Can someone respond.

Regards,
Raj.
creator: vincent.arokiaraj@bt.com
markt@apache.org
text:
This feature doesn't exist and certainly would never be added to any 4.1.x or 5.5.x version.

Frankly, I doubt it would be added to any version.

Depending on what your requirement is (rather than the thread pool solution you have selected) there may well be other ways to meet the requirement configuration and/or a little coding on your part.

The users list is the best place to get such advice but you will need to explain your underlying requirement.
